title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 17 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Madden, Cowboys, Kyrie
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 17 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Madden, Cowboys, Kyrie
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on why NFL QBs remind him of Ken Jennings and Jeopardy, why John Madden is the definition of the word "icon", why Dak and Mike McCarthy should be ok losing in the playoffs, what Lincoln Riley haters expose about themselves, and why Kyrie just admitted to his lack of intelligence. Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 17 picks are "sharp" or "square". They, give their picks for Vikings/Packers (16:00), Browns/Steelers (22:00), Eagles/Washington (23:00), Cardinals/Cowboys (25:00), Broncos/Chargers (28:00), Rams/Ravens (30:00), Dolphins/Titans (33:00), and Texans/49ers (35:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
